org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisSentinelCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    RedisSentinelConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    JedisSentinelConnection, LettuceSentinelConnection

    public interface RedisSentinelCommands
    Redis Sentinel-specific commands.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.4
    另请参阅:
    Redis Sentinel Documentation

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void failover(NamedNode master)
      Force a failover as if the master was not reachable.
      Collection<RedisServer> masters()
      Get a Collection of monitored masters and their state.
      void monitor(RedisServer master)
      Tell sentinel to start monitoring a new master with the specified RedisNode.getName(), RedisNode.getHost(), RedisNode.getPort(), and RedisServer.getQuorum().
      void remove(NamedNode master)
      Removes given master.
      Collection<RedisServer> slaves(NamedNode master)
      Show list of slaves for given master.

    • 方法详细资料

      • failover

        void failover(NamedNode master)
        Force a failover as if the master was not reachable.
        参数:
        master - must not be null.

      • masters

        Collection<RedisServer> masters()
        Get a Collection of monitored masters and their state.
        返回:
        Collection of RedisServers. Never null.

      • slaves

        Collection<RedisServer> slaves(NamedNode master)
        Show list of slaves for given master.
        参数:
        master - must not be null.
        返回:
        Collection of RedisServers. Never null.

      • remove

        void remove(NamedNode master)
        Removes given master. The server will no longer be monitored and will no longer be returned by masters().
        参数:
        master - must not be null.

      • monitor

        void monitor(RedisServer master)
        Tell sentinel to start monitoring a new master with the specified RedisNode.getName(), RedisNode.getHost(), RedisNode.getPort(), and RedisServer.getQuorum().
        参数:
        master - must not be null.
